mapper.insert: insert into tbl_class (class_nickname, class_title, class_category, class_place, class_price, class_start, class_end, class_approve, class_img, class_one, class_status, user_num, class_introduce) values (#{classNickname}, #{classTitle}, #{classCategory}, #{classPlace}, #{classPrice}, #{classStart}, #{classEnd}, #{classApprove}, #{classImg}, #{classOne}, #{classStatus}, #{userNum}, #{classIntroduce})
